name: Tinty Invaders
description:
A fancy, bored alien species, from a planet called Tintinus, have decided to invade the Earth. They enjoy tinting themselves with colors, to make them more confusing to defeat. To be effective, our heroes have to kill them in a specific way. Only those who master precision shots and strategy will survive. Will you take the challenge of protecting our planet from the Tinty Invaders?

Features
  • Action-puzzle mechanics
  • 65 levels with 13 different scenarios and 5 different movement types
  • 2 difficulty modes
  • Retro-look with not-so-retro particle effects
  • Single player
Minimum requirements

CPU: Dual-core

Graphics card: Intel HD Graphics 3000

Sound card: Any

Controls

Keyboard

  • Toggle fullscreen: F11
  • Start game: Enter
  • Movement: Left/Right arrows
  • Shot: Up arrow or Spacebar
  • Pause: Escape or P
  • Back from menus: Escape

Gamepad

  • Start game: Start button or A button
  • Movement: Dpad Left/Right buttons
  • Shot: A button
  • Pause: Start button
  • Back from menus: B button
Supported devices

Tested with:

  • PS4 Dualshock 4
  • iBUFFALO Classic USB Gamepad (SNES-like)
Credits
